content.chorus:
Into your sanctuary,
We've come to adore you Lord 2X
In adoration and praise
We glorify your Holy name oo e
Into your sanctuary,
We've come to adore you Lord
verses:
We thank you Lord,
For the gift of life in us
We reverence your Holy name
Oh our God

With sweet melody of joy
Our mouth is full of praise
Fr one day in your house
Is better than a thousand elsewhere

Hide us under the shadows
Of your wings
That we may overcome
The tribulations of the world

Let glory and honor
Be ascribed to the Father
Come the people of the choice
And own your gracious God
